recipe_name: Vanilla rice pudding with sesame and honey oranges
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the rice, milk, vanilla pod and sugar into a small pan and bring to a simmer. Cover with a lid and cook for 7-8 minutes, or until the rice is tender, then stir in the double cream. Remove the vanilla pod from the pan (it can be rinsed and used again). In a small bowl, mix the orange segments together with the honey and sesame seeds.  Spoon the rice pudding into a serving bowl and place the honey oranges on top. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a dusting of icing sugar.
ingredients: 150g/5oz long grain rice,  150ml/5fl oz milk,  ½ vanilla pod, split,  1 tbsp brown sugar,  75ml/2½fl oz double cream,  2 oranges, peeled and segmented,  1 tbsp honey,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  1 sprig fresh mint,  icing sugar, for dusting
